arts.ttl: Simeone scores twice as Atletico Madrid reaches Copa semifinals with 5-0 rout of Getafe
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone’s son, Giuliano, scored two early goals as the team eased into the Copa del Rey semifinals with a 5-0 home victory over Getafe on Tuesday. The 22-year-old Simeone netted twice in the first 17 minutes and Atletico reached the last-four of the Copa for the second straight season.

arts.ttl: Why Pablo Barrios is absent for Atlético Madrid vs Getafe
arts.sum: An explanation for the absence of Pablo Barrios from Atlético Madrid’s latest matchday squad has this evening been forthcoming online. Diego Simeone’s Atléti are of course currently locked in action.…

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid targeting four summer signings
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid have had a good season up until now, and they look firmly back in the fight in La Liga with Barcelona and Real Madrid. arts.ttl: Diego Simeone speaks out on Kylian Mbappé horror challenge
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has on Monday provided his take on the weekend controversy surrounding arch rivals Real Madrid. Carlo Ancelotti’s Real of course took their place centre…

arts.ttl: Former Atletico Madrid and Barcelona star Joao Felix set for 4th move in 3 years
arts.sum: Former Atletico Madrid and Barcelona playmaker Joao Felix looks set for another move, having left Spanish football last summer. The Portuguese star has struggled for minutes at Chelsea, and now looks to be on his way to Serie A for his first taste of Spanish football.
